body.name: Levi's All-Gender Casual Cut-to-Fit Web Belt Set –3 Pack Straps with Interchangeable Buckle, Black/Olive/Khaki, One Size
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Thursday, February 22 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
features: VERSATILE USE: This set includes one standard military buckle and 3 cut-to-fit belt straps. Use the military buckle to slide onto the strap of your choice to pair with a variety of outfits and create the look you desire.
IDEAL FIT: A great belt is nothing without a snug fit. The belt straps are cut-to-fit, with the length of the strap fitting up to a size 42.
GENDER NEUTRAL: Designed for all, this web belt set is meant to be worn by anyone, anywhere, anytime. With its versatile use the options are endless
SUPERIOR STYLE: The neutral web belt straps and antique nickel plaque buckle create the perfect blend of both comfort and fashion.
body.description: This 3 pack of Web Belts from Levi's is sure to be your new everyday go-to. The sleek and timeless style is durable and meant to last. Featuring plaque style buckles and fully adjustable designs, these belts from Levi's will be your new favorites. Pair with jeans, khakis or other casual pants for an effortlessly cool look. For more than 140 years after inventing the blue jean, one thing is clear: Levi's clothes are loved by the people who wear them - from presidents to movie stars, farmers to fashion icons, entrepreneurs to the everyday man, "Live in Levi's" asserts with confidence and pride that Levi's clothes are indeed for everybody who's not just anybody.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 13, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Very sturdy and good looking. Almost identical to GI belts. Only issue is they only come with one buckle. I bought a second buckle so I don't have to change buckles when I change my pants.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great set of belts for a great price
reviews.reviewText: For military veterans like myself, this set is exactly like our hole-less belt / friction buckle for dress uniforms. Never realized how nice a system it was until I started seeing ads for expensive ratchet buckle belt sets. I wear belts a lot for work and just in general and tend to wear out belts. The leather tends to crack, holes wear out, new holes drilled cuz I lost weight, new belt needed cuz I gained weight. This buckle can be positioned on the belt wherever you like, there is no hole to wear out because the buckle uses a friction bar. Need a new color? Slide the buckle off and put it on another belt. The canvas web belts are inexpensive, last forever and easy to store. This set comes with 3 neutral colors that so far go with just about everything I own.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars My Go To Belt
reviews.reviewText: Light weight, comfortable and easy to use. Good value.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 1, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Buckle Gets Stuck
reviews.reviewText: I was disappointed. Leave my jeans are the greatest so I figured the Belt would be the greatest but it was not. The pictures are misleading it comes with just one buckle not three. The size is little bit smaller than what is described. The only good part is that because the belts are actually smaller than described I did not need to do any cutting. The biggest appointment is the buckle. The one buckle that came with these spells doesn't work very well. It works okay when you put the belt on, but when you need to undo the buckle it gets stuck and takes quite a bit of effort and can take up to about 30 seconds or more. I will not buy again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2024
Reviewed in the United States on September 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Only 1 Complete Belt — This Fact Well-Buried
reviews.reviewText: I needed some new web belts and this 3-pack looked like the best deal, from a well-known brand to boot. How wrong I was! When the belts arrived, they included ONLY 1 BUCKLE — totally unlike the product photos I was positive that I remembered correctly. I went back to the website description, and sure enough they repeatedly show you 3 buckles, and then they DO let you know there’s only 1 buckle included — WAY DOWN in the 5th bullet point. To add insult to injury, these belts BARELY fit 42”. I also recently bought a good Columbia brand dress belt, and that one — listed at the same exact size of 42” — is several inches longer, allowing adequate belt length through the buckle and then to the first belt loop on my pants, which is exactly what I expected. Although these belts ARE 42” long, they barely reach through the buckle for fastening. I’m incredibly disappointed in both the marketing for this product as well as the product itself from a brand I’ve trusted for decades.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great gift for Dad
reviews.reviewText: Purchased this set of 3 belts for my Dad. We had bought other brands in the past but the buckles were poorly made and broke rather quickly. While this set only has one buckle, it seems pretty sturdy and can be interchanged with his military buckles. Waited to review to see how they held up, so far so good. Would recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars one buckle and awkward to use!
reviews.reviewText: I am excruciatingly disappointed with these belts. they come with a single belt buckle that's frustrating to put on a belt, let alone take off. it's hard to loosen the belt to let your pants down to pee. I'm stout (it fits fine) and i have to wiggle out of my pants because I dare not completely undo the belt in public lest I have to take it completely off to reaffix the buckle. only not giving it one star because it kept my pants up, which is the lowest bar possible for belts.

reviews.reviewTitle: Didn't need three but what a deal . . . .
reviews.reviewText: My 5+ year old Levi belt in the light tan was starting to wear and look a little shabby, even with jeans so I was on the hunt. Nothing in 2 locations of my usual go-to department store in Kitchener and Cambridge so of course I turned to Amazon.Found these. Didn't need to blue / black but what a deal.ONE CAVEAT: Three belts but only one buckle. Hmmm. Not a big deal as I also had the buckle from the old belt and switching a belt and a buckle is no big deal. Would have been nice to know if I was giving one of the belts to someone.
Only thing is they only come with one belt clasp for the 3 belts but you can only wear one at a time so they are a good value for the money, would recommend.
Good value. Good quality. Would have been nice to get a couple of buckles, but still a good buy.

The belts are only 46" long instead of 50. Thats a big difference for a belt. I wanted a bigger size i could cut as needed as im losing weight. It barely fits me instead of having a bit of room. Also only comes with one buckle to change between the 3 belts.
It only comes with one buckle, so it’s not really three belts. The picture is misleading.
